attributes.review:
This app is honestly the most horrifying thing that has ever happened to me 😢 and what made it worse is that it took me a whole month to download it.... when I downloaded it I wanted to support my president for his 2020 campaign but when I opened it a big orange 🍊 circle popped up in my face.... I was confused and then it jumped out the screen and IT ATTACKED ME AND MY WHOLE FAMILY!!!! My mom was forced to eat a bat. Fortunately the bat didn’t have the China virus like what our “lovely” president called it.... the orange 🍊 circle proceeded to bring in rats and make them start dancing and do a satanic ritual. If you didn’t know My family and I are conservative white Christians and were horrified by this 😰. We then tried calling the police to come and help us and they said help yourself and we were like WHAT but we are a white conservative family and we NEED help. Then they said and I quote “help yourself we are above the law and we should get more money for killing black lives and getting away with it” and we were just in shock 😳. Then the orange 🍊 circle came back to us and proceeded to make potions that would kill us and when I decided enough is enough I went on my phone and wanted to delete the app... it took me a while to figure out how but then I saw a link that said press here to delete and when I pressed it A WHOLE ASTEROID ☄️ CAME AND DESTROYED MY WHOLE TOWN. I would not recommend anyone to download this app because I don’t want people to experience what I experienced 😔.
DON’T DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!!!
attributes.title: TERRIBLE 💅🥰😔❤️🤩✨🌈

attributes.review: Worst app ever!! Downloaded this app and all the worms in my yard had mini  heart attacks!!
